scripts.install: npm run install-pnpm && pnpm run install-concurrently && cd server && pnpm install && cd ../client && pnpm install
scripts.devReal: concurrently --kill-others "cd client && pnpm run dev -- real" "pnpm run start -- real"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd client && pnpm run dev" "pnpm run start"
scripts.install-pnpm: npm install -g pnpm && pnpm config set auto-install-peers true
